questions.question: I think we are going the wrong way. Let's turn ........................
questions.description: To turn around is to change direction while driving.

questions.question: The new management could not turn the company .................
questions.description: To turn a loss making company around is to make it successful again.

questions.question: The watchman turned us .............................. at the door.
questions.description: To turn somebody away is to prevent them from entering a place.

questions.question: Could you turn the volume of that music ........................? It is too loud.
questions.description: To turn the volume down is to reduce it.

questions.question: It was a good offer but she turned it ..........................
questions.description: To turn down an offer is to refuse to accept it.

questions.question: All students should turn their assignments ................... on or before Friday.
questions.description: To turn in assignments is to submit them.

questions.question: I was tired so I turned ........................ early last night.
questions.description: To turn in early is to go to bed early.

questions.question: The murderer was turned ........................... by his own parents.
questions.description: To turn a criminal in is to deliver them to the police.

questions.question: When I get up in the morning, the first thing I do is turn ................... my laptop.
questions.description: To turn a device on is to start it.

questions.question: Body odor turns me .......................
questions.description: If something turns you off, it makes you lose interest.

questions.question: We thought that we would lose the contract but in the end everything turned ......................... all right.
